title: General:The Rain Water Harvesting (RWH) arrangement shall be provided in case ofDevelopment/Redevelopment of plots having area of500sq
clause_text: General:The Rain Water Harvesting (RWH) arrangement shall be provided in case ofDevelopment/Redevelopment of plots having area of500sq. m and more.It shall have one or more RWH structures having a minimum total capacity as detailed in schedule below; Provided that the professional on record shall certifythat the RWHSystem
